mapper.sql: id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, name, code, email, address, status, attachment_id_1,user_id,user_type,attachment_id_2,attachment_id_3,amount
mapper.select: select a.id, a.create_date, a.update_date, a.data_status, a.desp, a.name, a.code, a.email, a.address, a.status, a.attachment_id_1,a.user_id,a.attachment_id_2,a.attachment_id_3,a.amount concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',b.attachment_link) as attachment_id_1_link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',c.attachment_link) as attachment_id_2_link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',d.attachment_link) as attachment_id_3_link from t_company a left join t_attachment b on a.attachment_id_1 = b.id left join t_attachment c on a.attachment_id_2 = c.id left join t_attachment d on a.attachment_id_3 = d.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_company (id, update_date, desp, name, code, email, address, attachment_id_1,user_id,user_type,attachment_id_2,attachment_id_3,amount) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{attachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_company
id,
create_date,
update_date,
data_status,
desp,
name,
code,
email,
address,
status,
attachment_id_1,
attachment_id_2,
attachment_id_3,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{dataStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
#{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{attachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_company
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
desp = #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
attachment_id_1 = #{attachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment_id_2 = #{attachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment_id_3 = #{attachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_company set create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, desp = #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attachment_id_1 = #{attachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_id_2 = #{attachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_id_3 = #{attachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
